# apptrust_bound_package_versions (Data Source)

Returns bound package versions for a given application and package.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "apptrust_bound_package_versions" "example" {
  application_key = "my-web-app"
  package_type    = "maven"
  package_name    = "com.example:my-library"
}

output "versions" {
  value = data.apptrust_bound_package_versions.example.versions
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `application_key` (String) The application key.
- `package_name` (String) Package name.
- `package_type` (String) Package type (e.g. maven, docker).

### Optional

- `limit` (Number) Max versions to return (up to 250). Default 25.
- `offset` (Number) Pagination offset. Default 0.
- `package_version` (String) Filter by package version. If not set, all bound versions are returned.

### Read-Only

- `total` (Number) Total bound versions for this package.
- `versions` (Attributes List) List of bound package versions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--versions))

<a id="nestedatt--versions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `versions`

Read-Only:

- `vcs_branch` (String) VCS branch.
- `vcs_revision` (String) VCS revision.
- `vcs_url` (String) VCS URL.
- `version` (String) Version.
